languages.text: "Неистовая сестра Арджента вышла на охоту в теневых кварталах. Тем, кто заметил у себя признак мутации или скверны, рекомендуем бежать подальше".
"The fierce Sister Argenta is on the prowl in the Shadow Quarters. Those of you with signs of mutation or corruption better run as far as you can."
languages.original_text: "Неистовая сестра Арджента вышла на охоту в теневых кварталах. Тем, кто заметил у себя признак мутации или скверны, рекомендуем бежать подальше".

traits.locale_text: "The fierce Sister Argenta is on the prowl in the Shadow Quarters. Those of you with signs of mutation or corruption better run as far as you can."
"The fierce Sister Argenta is on the prowl in the Shadow Quarters. Those of you with signs of mutation or corruption better run as far as you can."
"The fierce Sister Argenta is on the prowl in the Shadow Quarters. Those of you with signs of mutation or corruption better run as far as you can."
"The fierce Sister Argenta is on the prowl in the Shadow Quarters. Those of you with signs of mutation or corruption better run as far as you can."
"The fierce Sister Argenta is on the prowl in the Shadow Quarters. Those of you with signs of mutation or corruption better run as far as you can."

languages.text: “凶暴的阿洁塔修女此刻正在阴影区徘徊。如果你们之中，有谁出现了变异或腐化的迹象，那你们最好能跑多远跑多远。”
languages.original_text: "The fierce Sister Argenta is on the prowl in the Shadow Quarters. Those of you with signs of mutation or corruption better run as far as you can."

traits.locale_text: “凶暴的阿洁塔修女此刻正在阴影区徘徊。如果你们之中，有谁出现了变异或腐化的迹象，那你们最好能跑多远跑多远。”

languages.text: «La fiera Hermana Argenta está al acecho en los barrios bajos. Quienes presenten síntomas de mutación o corrupción... que corran mientras puedan».
languages.original_text: "The fierce Sister Argenta is on the prowl in the Shadow Quarters. Those of you with signs of mutation or corruption better run as far as you can."

traits.locale_text: «La fiera Hermana Argenta está al acecho en los barrios bajos. Quienes presenten síntomas de mutación o corrupción... que corran mientras puedan».

languages.text: 「鬼のシスター・アルジェンタがシャドウクォーターを徘徊中。突然変異や腐敗の恐れがある方々は、できるだけ遠くへ逃げましょう」
languages.original_text: "The fierce Sister Argenta is on the prowl in the Shadow Quarters. Those of you with signs of mutation or corruption better run as far as you can."

traits.locale_text: 「鬼のシスター・アルジェンタがシャドウクォーターを徘徊中。突然変異や腐敗の恐れがある方々は、できるだけ遠くへ逃げましょう」
「鬼のシスター・アルジェンタがシャドウクォーターを徘徊中。突然変異や腐敗の恐れがある方々は、できるだけ遠くへ逃げましょう」

languages.text: "Die wilde Schwester Argenta ist in den Schattenquartieren auf der Pirsch. Wer Anzeichen von Mutation oder Verderbtheit aufweist, sollte sofort das Weite suchen."
languages.original_text: "The fierce Sister Argenta is on the prowl in the Shadow Quarters. Those of you with signs of mutation or corruption better run as far as you can."

traits.locale_text: "Die wilde Schwester Argenta ist in den Schattenquartieren auf der Pirsch. Wer Anzeichen von Mutation oder Verderbtheit aufweist, sollte sofort das Weite suchen."

languages.text: « La redoutable sœur Argenta rôde dans le Quartier des Ombres. Si vous montrez des signes de mutation ou de corruption, vous feriez bien de prendre vos jambes à votre cou. »
languages.original_text: "The fierce Sister Argenta is on the prowl in the Shadow Quarters. Those of you with signs of mutation or corruption better run as far as you can."

traits.locale_text: « La redoutable sœur Argenta rôde dans le Quartier des Ombres. Si vous montrez des signes de mutation ou de corruption, vous feriez bien de prendre vos jambes à votre cou. »

languages.text: "Rahibe Argenta, tüm acımasızlığıyla Gölge Mahalli'nde kol geziyor. Aranızda mutasyon veya yozlaşma belirtisi gösterenler varsa kaçabildiği kadar uzağa kaçsın."
languages.original_text: "The fierce Sister Argenta is on the prowl in the Shadow Quarters. Those of you with signs of mutation or corruption better run as far as you can."

traits.locale_text: "Rahibe Argenta tüm şiddetiyle Gölge Mahali'nde dolaşıyor. Aranızda mutasyon veya yozlaşma belirtisi gösterenler varsa, kaçabildiği kadar uzağa kaçsın."
